attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for continuing offenders for, child abuse,
attributes.additional_details: I feel a lot of people would agree with me we need to protect our children in order to save there future and THE FUTURE
attributes.background: I am creating this petition due to the fact of the amount of child neglect abuse and murders I am seeing and also the repeat offenders. We need to come to a realisation that they are taking away our future generation, our children don’t deserve suffering, only love

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back death penalty for child killers and mass murderers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602898

Bring back the death penalty for sexual abuse against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593534
